scatterplot of body mass versus flipper length:

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species), size = 4) ##only include stuff related to variables within aes, otherwise put things outside of aes
```
